name: Painted Plates
description:
This creative app allows you to create beautiful and unique plate patterns. The rotation of the plate lets you quickly and easily arrange various compositions. The process of applying decorations is relaxing and encourages you to experiment with the wide range of available ornaments.

On one hand it is pleasant and relaxing fun for everybody; on the other hand it’s a real challenge for creative people, who want to make a unique masterpiece.


The full version contains:
- 8 plate shapes in 15 different colours,
- 175 ornaments grouped in 11 series,
- each ornament is also available in several colour versions and in different sizes,
- the photo of a finished plate can be saved and shared with friends,
- various additional tools also allow you to arrange more complex patterns.
